title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 343: Featuring Jon Cooper
description:
On Episode 343 of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Stanley Cup winning coach of the Tampa Bay Lightning, Jon Cooper. Coop joined (00:35:27) to talk about his crazy rise from lawyer to one of the top coaches in the NHL, the Lightning’s playoff run, winning back to back Cups and a ton more. The boys also give their own recap of Game 5 and put a bow on the season. The fellas also discuss some NHL news, including Duncan Keith being traded to Edmonton. The guys wrap up talking a little golf and with some movie/TV talk.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
